channel.title: Arch Linux on Why The Platypus Codes
channel.description: Recent content in Arch Linux on Why The Platypus Codes

item.title: How the Platypus Built an Arch
item.description: One evening the platypus was in his workshop tinkering with a new piece of code. As the evening wore on and the code grew the platypus started to think about the code’s future. Who would use it? Where would it live? He knew that only he would use the code, it was just a silly personal project after all, but to his dismay he did not know where it could live.
